titles: Nugæ venales, sive, Thesaurus ridendi & jocandi Ad gravissimos severissimosque viros, patres melancholicorum conscriptos opus plane novum & necessarium; in quo quid contineator, quævis pagina docebit.
publisher: Anno 1642. Prostant apud neminem; sed tamen ubique,
notes: Theses de hasione et hasibili qualitate, Themata medica, and Theses inaugurales quas ex Senatus have a separate divisional title pages.
Crepundia poëtica somniata and Pugna porcorum each have separate dated title pages, separate pagination and separate registers.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
keywords: Latin wit and humor --  Early works to 1800.
